attributes.action: Get people who are receiving Job Seekers Allowance working until they are employed
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If people in receipt of JSA were made to carry out tasks or work for their benefits around their local communties such as painting fences, clearing litter from streets etc.  I'm sure they would find themselves work quicker.  This would also cut down on Council's maintenance bills and the cost Government hand outs, therefore releasing valubale funds that would be made available in other areas of the Country.  This would also provide on the job training for people looking to return to work.
